Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
Night is upon us. Preparations for the morrow
must be made...

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
...To clean floors and to clean windows. That is
my job. That is my life.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
Our lady can be scary...but deep down, she's as
kind as can be.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
I follow our lady's orders because I am her maid,
and it is my duty.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
...Our lady can be most selfish on occasion.
Though please do not share this revelation with
her.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
Our lady's...ambiance...has turned soft and
gentle these days.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
Our lady paid me a most gracious compliment
the other day. I was elated.

<NAME_MOB_SARAH>
Our lady is scary...but deep down, she is also
kind as can be. I've said so before, and I say it
again with confidence and certainty.
